name: NES 101 - TOP LOADER
description:
In 1993, the NES 2 (model 101) known as Top Loader was launched by Nintendo to reduce manufacturing costs.
The power and reset buttons now matched the curvature of the new look. 
The NES-101 does not have an LED power light to indicate the unit is on
This frustrated many gamers who customizing the console inserting a LED light into the Power button. 
The NES-101 returned to the standard top-loading method, used by almost all cartridge systems before and since for its ease and reliability.
